item.title: [602] Zombie minigame
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

Hello, i was wondering if anyone could tell me wy the zmbie minigame will only do the first wave of zombies. Thanks.

[code]package server.model.minigames;

import server.model.players.Client;
import server.Server;
import server.model.npcs.NPCHandler;

public class ZombieCaves {
private final int[][] ZOMBIES = {{73},{73,73},{73,73,73,73},{73,73,73,73,73,73,73,1465},{1465,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73},{1465,1465,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73}};
private int[][] coordinates = {{2603,9906},{2604,9906},{2603,9907},{2603,9908},{2602,9906},{2601,9906}};
//73,74,75 normal zombies 1465,1466 monkey zombies
public void spawnNextZombies(Client c) {
if (c != null) {
if (c.zombiesId >= ZOMBIES.length) {
c.zombiesId = 0;
return;
}
if (c.zombiesId < 0){
return;
}
int npcAmount = ZOMBIES[c.zombiesId].length;
for (int j = 0; j < npcAmount; j++) {
int npc = ZOMBIES[c.zombiesId][j];
int X = coordinates[j][0];
int Y = coordinates[j][1];
int H = c.heightLevel;
int hp = getHp(npc);
int max = getMax(npc);
int atk = getAtk(npc);
int def = getDef(npc);
Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, npc, X, Y, H, 0, hp, max, atk, def, true, false);
}
c.zombiesKilled = 0;
c.zombiesToKill = npcAmount;
if (c.zombiesKilled != c.zombiesToKill) {
npcAmount++;
}
}

}

public int getHp(int npc) {
	switch (npc) {
		case 73:
		return 150;
		case 74:
		return 150;
		case 1465:
		return 150;
		case 75:
		return 200;
		case 1466: 
		return 200;
		case 3066:
		return 350;		
	}
	return 100;
}

public int getMax(int npc) {
	switch (npc) {
		case 73:
		return 30;
		case 74:
		return 50;
		case 1465:
		return 50;
		case 75:
		return 75;
		case 1466: 
		return 75;
		case 3066:
		return 97;		
	}
	return 5;
}

public int getAtk(int npc) {
	switch (npc) {
		case 73:
		return 120;
		case 74:
		return 200;
		case 1465:
		return 200;
		case 75:
		return 350;
		case 1466: 
		return 350;
		case 3066:
		return 650;		
	}
	return 100;
}

public int getDef(int npc) {
	switch (npc) {
		case 73:
		return 120;
		case 74:
		return 170;
		case 1465:
		return 170;
		case 75:
		return 300;
		case 1466: 
		return 300;
		case 3066:
		return 500;		
	}
	return 100;
}

}[/code]
